Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • Main

  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class that is responsible for running the Huffman algorithm.

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

      • huffmanCodeMap

        public static <K> java.util.HashMap<K,java.lang.String> huffmanCodeMap​(java.util.HashMap<K,java.lang.Double> alphabet)
        Given an alphabet of generic values, encode them with huffman algorithm.
        Type Parameters:
        K - type of values.
        Parameters:
        alphabet - (value: probability) pairs.
        Returns:
        dictionary of (value: encoding) pairs.

      • huffmanCodeText

        public static java.lang.String huffmanCodeText​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Character,java.lang.Double> alphabet,
                                               java.lang.String text)
        Given the alphabet of the values in the given text, return the encoded text.
        Parameters:
        alphabet - (char: probability) pairs for each char in the text.
        text - text to encode.
        Returns:
        encoded text (String).

      • huffmanTreeToCode

        public static <K> void huffmanTreeToCode​(HuffmanBinNode<K> root,
                                         java.lang.String encoding,
                                         java.util.HashMap<K,java.lang.String> code)
        Recursive function which gets the corresponding encoding from the given Huffman tree.
        Type Parameters:
        K - type of the root values.
        Parameters:
        root - root of the Huffman tree.
        encoding - temporary string to build the individual encodings.
        code - map to put the finished encodings into.

      • huffmanTree

        public static <K> HuffmanBinNode<K> huffmanTree​(java.util.HashMap<K,java.lang.Double> alphabet)
        Generates Huffman Encoding Tree from a given alphabet dictionary.
        Type Parameters:
        K - type of keys in the alphabet.
        Parameters:
        alphabet - dictionary containing all possible values and their probabilities.
        Returns:
        root of the generated tree.

      • printMap

        public static <T,K> void printMap​(java.util.HashMap<T,K> map)
        Gets a generic map and prints all the (key,value) pairs in the format: "[key]: value"
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of keys.
        K - type of values.
        Parameters:
        map - dictionary to print.

      • countProbabilities

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Character,java.lang.Double> countProbabilities​(java.lang.String text)
        Counts probabilities for each character in a given text, with respect to the whole text.
        Parameters:
        text - text to count probabilities for.
        Returns:
        dictionary with keys - distinct characters, values - their probabilities.

      • informationContent

        public static <T> double informationContent​(java.util.HashMap<T,java.lang.Double> map)
        Returns Shannon information content from a given map of values with their probabilities.
        Type Parameters:
        T - value of the dictionary keys.
        Parameters:
        map - dictionary of possible values and their probabilities.
        Returns:
        information content. (By Shannon information definition.)
